name: NeoDungeon
description:
This is my first try at making a full game. I'm still working in this page too!

Please be noted that i can only do this in my spare time, but im trying to do something every day, i won't promise anything though!

If you've found some bug, please report it in https://github.com/NeosCCV/neos-shitty-games/issues, i'll look into it >:3

I upload news about this and other projects at https://t.me/neosshittygames if you are interested!
